list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Added error trapping in relation to runfile creation and condition where there are no subarea sheets or where there is a subarea sheet but no corresponding entry in the subarea lookup sheet.

task.summary: Default task
insignificant changes for harmonisation purposes only
minor changes to trap various bugs on the way to a more robust program
more minor changes to improve feedback to the user and GUI layout on the Run tab
added farm system and region drop-downs to GUI
addressed a number of I/O related bugs

created a Run model push button in the Run tab which replaces soil C and N, livestock and economics push button also, improved run file checking to improve robustness, albeit this will require revisiting to clean up the code.
removed view CSV weather push button and slighly rearanged Farm GUI
introduced separate economics Excel file comprising Purchases & Sales and Labour sheets

introduced separate economics Excel file comprising Purchases & Sales and Labour sheets. Renamed attributes pertaining to livestock to remove africa_ prefix e.g. africa_systems is now farm_systems, africa_regions is now world_regions

introduced separate economics Excel file comprising Purchases & Sales and Labour sheets. Renamed attributes pertaining to livestock to remove africa_ prefix e.g. africa_systems is now farm_systems, africa_regions is now world_regions

1) modified function linked to the ‘View Economics’ push button so that default PurchasesSalesLabour Excel file is copied to farm run directory 2) Clear data push button added to Livestock tab. 3) Addressed condition where a subarea is present in the farm run file but has no description in the Subareas sheet.
Addressed situation where a subarea management has a diffrent temporal length compared with weather.
1) split livestock and economics push button in Run Model tab 2) added empty Catchment tab
corrected bug whereby program falls over if run file has no subarea sheets
corrected bugs encountered during demonstration on 7 Dec 2022 itemised by MJM in current_bugs.xlsx
reordered reading of configuration file to come after invocation of OutLog class
Trying a fix an "Unhandled Python exception" during the "Save farm" action.
Fixed an "Unhandled Python exception" during the "Save farm" action. Tidied code.

Fixed an "Unhandled Python exception" during generation of Excel results files - fixed by use of write.close() instead of write.save() in ora_excel_write.py and ora_excel_write_cn_water.py modules. Tidied code.
Minor code Tidy
revising the "all subareas" component of the Excel results outputs. Further work required.
Resolved bug when program failed when writing Excel output files in the _generate_comparison_charts method of ora_excel_write_cn_water.py module.
Resolved bug due to division by zero when calculating water stress index in ora_water_model.py module. Only manifest when AET is zero due to low temperature.
Resolved in Sensitivity Analysis to trap non-numeric values for organic waste applied. Minor changes to conform to PEP standards.
Added further error traping in relation to the configuration file and Sensitivity Analysis values for organic waste applied..
Added error trapping in relation to runfile creation and condition where there are no subarea sheets or where there is a subarea sheet but no corresponding entry in the subarea lookup sheet.

MESSAGE.value: insignificant changes for harmonisation purposes only
minor changes to trap various bugs on the way to a more robust program
more minor changes to improve feedback to the user and GUI layout on the Run tab
added farm system and region drop-downs to GUI
addressed a number of I/O related bugs

created a Run model push button in the Run tab which replaces soil C and N, livestock and economics push button also, improved run file checking to improve robustness, albeit this will require revisiting to clean up the code.
removed view CSV weather push button and slighly rearanged Farm GUI
introduced separate economics Excel file comprising Purchases & Sales and Labour sheets

introduced separate economics Excel file comprising Purchases & Sales and Labour sheets. Renamed attributes pertaining to livestock to remove africa_ prefix e.g. africa_systems is now farm_systems, africa_regions is now world_regions

1) modified function linked to the ‘View Economics’ push button so that default PurchasesSalesLabour Excel file is copied to farm run directory 2) Clear data push button added to Livestock tab. 3) Addressed condition where a subarea is present in the farm run file but has no description in the Subareas sheet.
Addressed situation where a subarea management has a diffrent temporal length compared with weather.
1) split livestock and economics push button in Run Model tab 2) added empty Catchment tab
corrected bug whereby program falls over if run file has no subarea sheets
corrected bugs encountered during demonstration on 7 Dec 2022 itemised by MJM in current_bugs.xlsx
reordered reading of configuration file to come after invocation of OutLog class
Trying a fix an "Unhandled Python exception" during the "Save farm" action.
Fixed an "Unhandled Python exception" during the "Save farm" action. Tidied code.

Fixed an "Unhandled Python exception" during generation of Excel results files - fixed by use of write.close() instead of write.save() in ora_excel_write.py and ora_excel_write_cn_water.py modules. Tidied code.
Minor code Tidy
revising the "all subareas" component of the Excel results outputs. Further work required.
Resolved bug when program failed when writing Excel output files in the _generate_comparison_charts method of ora_excel_write_cn_water.py module.
Resolved bug due to division by zero when calculating water stress index in ora_water_model.py module. Only manifest when AET is zero due to low temperature.
Resolved in Sensitivity Analysis to trap non-numeric values for organic waste applied. Minor changes to conform to PEP standards.
Added further error traping in relation to the configuration file and Sensitivity Analysis values for organic waste applied..
Added error trapping in relation to runfile creation and condition where there are no subarea sheets or where there is a subarea sheet but no corresponding entry in the subarea lookup sheet.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added error trapping in relation to runfile creation and condition where there are no subarea sheets or where there is a subarea sheet but no corresponding entry in the subarea lookup sheet.
